Question
========

Given the following 16 outcomes of a sampling: 21, 26, 18, 17, 24, 33, 37, 30, 24, 28, 24, 31, 35, 29, 18, 21. The sampling standard deviation of the 16 numbers is

Answerlist
----------

* 1.55
* 6.2
* 36
* 38.4

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.55: Incorrect
* 6.2: Correct
* 36: Incorrect
* 38.4: Incorrect
